channel.title: DNS on Claudio Noguera
channel.description: Recent content in DNS on Claudio Noguera

item.title: Movistar DNS
item.description: I had been suffering connection issues lately which made the internet feel slow. Frustrating, as I have a 100 Mbps FTTH connection. The problem is the DNS. Most of the time I use Google’s DNS: 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 At one point I decided I should use Movistar’s own DNS because it pings in about 5ms, which is good, so I added them to my DNSs. However they are not reliable at all.
